xyz.cofe.cxconsole.srvc

Class StartableService

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.cofe.cxconsole.srvc.AbstractService
      • xyz.cofe.cxconsole.srvc.StartableService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConsoleService, ServiceEventPublisher, StartService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseService, DefaultActionsService, DefaultMenuService, DockingService, MapDB2Service, MenuService, ScriptService, StartPageService, SystemOutService

    public abstract class StartableService
extends AbstractService
implements StartService
    Сервис с поддержкой start/stop
    Author:
    Kamnev Georgiy (nt.gocha@gmail.com)
